value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I've just received a report that our
enemy has invaded another world.
We must head there at once.$k$p$EFace_Anger|The world we are about to enter will
be...er, slightly peculiar compared
to some other worlds.$k$p$EFace|No time to explain. Let's go.$k$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Hmm...Prince Alfonse and
Princess Sharena...$k$pSo, I take it that you've come to
challenge Eirika and me.$k$pI'll warn you now. The family bond
between us is forged from the
strongest steel.$k$p$WmMPID_エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ephraim, please! Such words
really don't suit you.$k$pApologies for my brother.$k$pI am Eirika, Princess of Renais. I do
not wish to war with you. But you
came here. So war it is.$k

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Hmm, I'll admit you did well here.
Eirika and I will be taking our
leave of you.$k$pShe and I may lose a fight, but never
a war. That is why we are so strong
together.$k$pOur bond has been tempered by
difficult times.$k$pShe and I will not lose the next
time we meet.$k$Sbs150|
